input_email_body:
Subject: Hospital Security Enhancements

Customer Support, requesting the enhancement of security protocols for all hospital systems and related software to safeguard medical data My name is John Doe.. It is crucial to protect sensitive patient information and prevent data breaches. I would greatly appreciate it if this matter could be addressed urgently to ensure the necessary measures are implemented. Thank you for your attention to this matter You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
